catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 500
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: comic books depicting changes after foreigners entered Japan; mostly text with small images: boiling kettle with fan; man stepping into the night; bathers, etc.; light blue cover with impressed floral decoration
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Collection of Humorous Leftovers (Kokkei zansai bukuro 滑稽残菜嚢), vol.
